overview.challenge: Lexus had long been known as the dependable choice. Refined, reliable, but also predictable. To win younger buyers, we needed to prove Lexus could be unexpected.
overview.solution: Created annual April Fools cultural moments with campaigns like Lane Valet, Genetic Select, and Driving Disrupted that reframed Lexus as unexpected, playful, and culturally relevant.
overview.impact: Since 2015, Lexus cultural moments have delivered real impact including millions of views, major press, and stronger youth sentiment proving Lexus could win over a new generation of buyers.

slides.title: Lexus April Fools
slides.description: A long running series that made Lexus feel unexpected, clever, and part of the cultural conversation.
